source: IRS Revenue Procedure 2024-40; IRS Newsroom Tax Inflation Adjustments for Tax Year 2025

alternative_minimum_tax.notes: AMT exemption phases out at 25 cents per dollar above threshold.

estate_and_gift.notes: Estate exclusion per decedent dying in 2025. Gift exclusion per donee per year.

adoption_credit.notes: Maximum adoption credit for qualified adoption expenses.

personal_exemption.notes: Personal exemption suspended by TCJA for 2018-2025, permanently eliminated by One Big Beautiful Bill Act.

itemized_deduction_limitation.notes: Pease limitation suspended by TCJA for 2018-2025, permanently eliminated by One Big Beautiful Bill Act.

notes: Additional tax parameters from Rev. Proc. 2024-40. All amounts adjusted for inflation by approximately 2.8% from 2024.
